name: Neo Cab
summary: Play as Lina, the last human driver-for hire searching for her missing friend in the neon streets of Los Ojos. In this interactive story, you’ll meet unique passengers during your nightly shifts, each with their own clues and secrets, if you can get them to share.
info:
• 中文名: 未来出租车
  • 发行: Fellow Traveller
  • 平台: PC
